thread.section_title: Mandarin Oriental, Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Birthday vacation
thread.title_full: Birthday vacation - Review of Mandarin Oriental, Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DanDman26
title: Birthday vacation
text:
This March my wife wanted a special trip to a beautiful city. Paris, we have been here on four other occasions. After reading reviews and checking location we chose the Mandarin. Our stay was first class. The modern hotel has excellent rooms, fantastic shower facilities. And more importantly the best service we have ever seen. Every single person did go out three way to provide the best possible service. Will be back here for sure and thanks for my birthday cake.
Daniel
Los Angeles.
